scripts.lint: eslint . --max-warnings=0 --report-unused-disable-directives && echo '✔  Your .js files look so good.' && htmlhint -c ./.htmlhintrc views/*.ejs && htmlhint -c ./.htmlhintrc views/**/*.ejs && htmlhint -c ./.htmlhintrc views/**/**/*.ejs && htmlhint -c ./.htmlhintrc views/**/**/**/*.ejs && htmlhint -c ./.htmlhintrc views/**/**/**/**/*.ejs && htmlhint -c ./.htmlhintrc views/**/**/**/**/**/*.ejs && htmlhint -c ./.htmlhintrc views/**/**/**/**/**/**/*.ejs && echo '✔  So do your .ejs files.' && lesshint assets/styles/ --max-warnings=0 && echo '✔  Your .less files look good, too.'
scripts.custom-tests: echo "(No other custom tests yet.)" && echo
